title: Euromillions results: Winning National Lottery Lotto numbers for Tuesday
text:
No-one has won the main prize tonight which means it rolls over to Friday, for the sixth time.

Tonight an incredible £61million was up for grabs and we brought you the results of the draw as soon as it was made.

As well as all this, there was the Thunderball draw at 8.15pm which offered £500,000.

Tonight it was a quintuple rollover - meaning it was the fifth draw since someone last won, and making it a massive top prize.

Interest has been high in the Euromillions draw ever since a single UK ticket holder bagged themselves an all-time record win earlier this month.

(Image: Wales Online)

One lucky player scooped a stratospheric £170million on October 8 and came forward to claim the prize on October 10. They received the money yesterday, on October 28.

But now attention turns to Friday - surely someone has to win soon?

Recap all the action below -
description: The whopping jackpot will get even bigger as it rolls over again from the £61million quintuple rollover tonight
